sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Fix script to set audit for sys_cluster_state when upgrading to Washington</description>
        <name>Set sys_cluster_state table audit</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[enableSysClusterStateAudit();

function enableSysClusterStateAudit() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_cluster_state');
	gr.addQuery('internal_type', 'collection');
	gr.addNullQuery('element');
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	gr.query();
	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('audit', 'true');
		gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-21 00:12:15</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>69fa0217439131103605c52bbab8f2a9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set sys_cluster_state table audit</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System Scheduler" source="com.glide.system_scheduler">4433b8603c31311068bcf327dfe37f6e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_69fa0217439131103605c52bbab8f2a9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-25 23:00:09</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
